gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 131, Grizzlies 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Grizzlies, 131-91. Jayson Tatum recorded 34 points, eight rebounds, and seven assists for the Celtics, with Kristaps Porzingis adding 26 points, eight rebounds, and two blocks in the victory. Scotty Pippen Jr. tallied 19 points, six rebounds, and four assists for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 38-12, while the Grizzlies fall to 18-32.
